CustomField.formula: if( text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'IFP' || text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'LCD' || text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'Monitor' || text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'Cloud' || text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'PJ' || text( PricebookEntry.Product2.Family )= 'DS' ,false, true)
CustomField.label: Accessory
